Description:
The Credit Control Manager is responsible for overseeing the company's credit control process, ensuring that customers pay their invoices on time and in full. This includes setting credit limits, monitoring customer accounts, and following up on overdue payments. The Credit Control Manager also works closely with the sales team to ensure that credit terms are understood and adhered to.Responsibilities:Set and monitor credit limits for customers
Review customer accounts and identify potential problems
Follow up on overdue payments
Negotiate payment plans with customers
Work with the sales team to ensure that credit terms are understood and adhered to
Prepare reports on the company's credit control performance
Stay up-to-date on industry best practicesReporting to the Finance DirectorSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in accounting, finance, or a related field
8+ years of experience in credit control, preferably in a manufacturing environment
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Proficient in Microsoft Office
